0.name: Alternaria Leaf Spot
0.cure: Apply fungicides with chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
0.growth_tips: Avoid prolonged leaf wetness and improve air circulation.

1.name: Anthracnose
1.cure: Use a fungicide with azoxystrobin. Remove infected plant debris.
1.growth_tips: Practice crop rotation and avoid overhead watering.

2.name: Bacterial Leaf Blight
2.cure: Apply copper-based sprays and remove infected plants.
2.growth_tips: Ensure proper plant spacing and avoid high humidity.

3.name: Bacterial Wilt
3.cure: Remove and destroy affected plants. Use resistant varieties.
3.growth_tips: Ensure proper soil drainage and avoid overwatering.

4.name: Black Rot
4.cure: Apply copper fungicides and remove affected leaves.
4.growth_tips: Use disease-free seeds and avoid overhead watering.

5.name: Blight
5.cure: Apply a copper fungicide and remove infected plant parts.
5.growth_tips: Rotate crops and avoid planting in the same soil yearly.

6.name: Brown Spot
6.cure: Use copper-based fungicides and remove infected leaves.
6.growth_tips: Ensure good drainage and avoid overhead irrigation.

7.name: Cercospora Leaf Spot
7.cure: Apply neem oil or copper fungicides.
7.growth_tips: Improve soil drainage and reduce plant stress.

8.name: Damping-Off
8.cure: Remove and destroy affected seedlings. Avoid overwatering and ensure good air circulation. Use fungicide-treated seeds or apply soil fungicides like captan or metalaxyl.
8.growth_tips: Use sterile, well-draining soil and avoid planting seeds too densely. Water in the morning to allow soil surface to dry and provide adequate light and ventilation.

9.name: Downy Mildew
9.cure: Apply fungicides like metalaxyl or copper-based sprays.
9.growth_tips: Ensure good air movement and reduce humidity around plants.

10.name: Early Blight
10.growth_tips: Mulch around plants to prevent soil splash.

11.name: Fusarium Wilt
11.cure: Use fungicides containing thiophanate-methyl. Rotate crops.
11.growth_tips: Improve soil health and avoid planting in contaminated areas.

12.name: Gray Mold
12.cure: Use fungicides like iprodione or thiophanate-methyl.
12.growth_tips: Increase airflow and remove dead plant material.

13.name: Healthy
13.cure: No treatment required. Maintain optimal watering and fertilization.
13.growth_tips: Ensure proper sunlight and regular pruning for better growth.

14.name: Leaf Curl
14.cure: Apply fungicides before bud break, such as Bordeaux mixture.
14.growth_tips: Use disease-resistant varieties and prune infected areas.

15.name: Leaf Spot
15.cure: Use fungicidal sprays and remove infected leaves promptly.
15.growth_tips: Water plants at the base and avoid wetting the leaves.

16.name: Mosaic Virus
16.cure: No chemical cure. Remove and destroy infected plants.
16.growth_tips: Control aphids and other pests that spread the virus.

17.name: Powdery Mildew
17.cure: Use fungicides containing sulfur or neem oil. Remove affected leaves.
17.growth_tips: Ensure proper air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

18.name: Rust
18.cure: Apply copper-based fungicides. Remove infected leaves to prevent spread.
18.growth_tips: Plant resistant varieties and maintain proper spacing.

19.name: Scab
19.cure: Apply fungicides containing sulfur or captan.
19.growth_tips: Use resistant plant varieties and prune regularly.

20.name: Septoria Leaf Spot
20.cure: Use fungicides with chlorothalonil or copper compounds.
20.growth_tips: Avoid excessive nitrogen fertilization and water at the base.

21.name: Sooty Mold
21.cure: Control the insects that cause mold buildup (e.g., aphids, whiteflies).
21.growth_tips: Use insecticidal soap and keep plants clean from honeydew.

22.name: Verticillium Wilt
22.cure: No effective treatment. Remove infected plants and improve soil.
22.growth_tips: Use disease-resistant varieties and improve soil aeration.

23.name: White Mold
23.cure: Apply fungicides like thiophanate-methyl and remove affected plants.
23.growth_tips: Improve soil drainage and avoid excessive moisture.

24.name: Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
24.cure: No cure available. Remove infected plants to prevent spread.
24.growth_tips: Control whiteflies as they spread the virus.
